props.name: center
props.docs: to center the alert content.

props.name: closable
props.docs: to make the alert dismissible.

props.name: color
props.docs: to set alert state { success, danger, warning, info, muted }.

props.name: icon
props.docs: to avoid necessity of adding <chi-icon> to alert markup.

props.name: mutable
props.docs: to hide the alert when dismissed.

props.name: size
props.docs: to set alert size { sm, md, lg }.

props.name: title
props.docs: to define alert title.

props.name: type
props.docs: to set alert type { bubble, banner, toast }.

events.docs: custom event when trying to dismiss an alert.

props.name: color
props.docs: to set color of a badge { primary, success, warning, danger, dark, muted, secondary, light }.

props.name: size
props.docs: to set size of a badge { xs or sm }.

props.name: textTransform
props.docs: to transform the badge text { uppercase, lowercase, capitalized }.

props.name: variant
props.docs: to set variant of a badge { outline, flat }.

props.name: color
props.docs: to set brand color { black, white, inverse }.

props.name: size
props.docs: to set size of brand.

props.name: type
props.docs: to set brand type { black, white, inverse }.

props.name: alternativeText
props.docs: to provide alternative text in case of icon buttons.

props.name: center
props.docs: to center align the text .

props.name: color
props.docs: to set button color { primary, secondary, danger, dark, light }.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: to disable chi-button.

props.name: fluid
props.docs: to render a button to fill the parent space.

props.name: size
props.docs: to set button size { sm, md, lg, xl }.

props.name: type
props.docs: to set button type { float, close, icon }.

props.name: variant
props.docs: to set variant of a button { outline, flat }.

events.docs: to emit a custom event when button is clicked.

props.name: excludedDates
props.docs: To specify which dates to disable

props.name: excludedWeekdays
props.docs: To specify which days of week to disable

props.name: format
props.docs: Date format used in the attributes and how it will be shown to the user.

props.name: locale
props.docs: Locale to use in date picker

props.name: max
props.docs: Maximum eligible date

props.name: min
props.docs: Minimum eligible date

props.name: value
props.docs: Selected date in the date picker

events.docs: Date change value event

props.name: active
props.docs: Indicates whether the dropdown calendar is open or closed

props.name: disabled
props.docs: to disable chi-date-picker.

props.docs: To specify which dates to disable

props.name: excludedWeekdays
props.docs: To specify which days of week to disable

props.name: format
props.docs: Date format used in the attributes and how it will be shown to the user.

props.name: locale
props.docs: Locale to use in date picker

props.name: max
props.docs: Maximum eligible date

props.name: min
props.docs: Minimum eligible date

props.name: value

props.name: active
props.docs: to open or close the drawer

props.name: backdrop
props.docs: to add a backdrop behind the drawer, which covers the viewport

props.name: noHeader
props.docs: to remove the space for the header

props.name: nonClosable
props.docs: To render Drawer without a close button

props.name: position
props.docs: to set position of the drawer { top, right, bottom or left }

props.name: preventAutoHide
props.docs: to prevent closing when the user clicked outside the Drawer

props.name: title
props.docs: to define drawer title. Not compatible with no-header

events.docs: Drawer has been hidden to the user. The animation has completed.
Drawer hide method has executed, but the closing animation has not started yet
Drawer show method has executed, but the showing animation has not started yet
Drawer has been shown to the user and is fully visible. The animation has completed.

props.name: bordered
props.docs: to set the panel style to bordered

props.name: state
props.docs: to set expansion panel state. Possible values are: {'done', 'active', 'pending' (default value), and 'disabled'}

props.name: step
props.docs: to set a step number next to the title of the panel

props.name: title
props.docs: to define expansion panel title.

props.name: color
props.docs: OPTIONAL. Color of the icon. Accepts any color the text-utility supports {primary, success, warning, danger, light, muted, grey, secondary}

props.name: extraClass
props.docs: OPTIONAL classes

props.name: icon
props.docs: Icon to be rendered. View accepted values on text documentation.

props.name: size
props.docs: OPTIONAL. Size of the Icon. {xs, sm, sm--2, sm--3, md, lg, xl, xxl}

props.name: for
props.docs: To indicate ID of target form control web component.

props.name: optional
props.docs: To indicate which form field is optional.

props.name: required
props.docs: To indicate which form field is required.

props.name: size
props.docs: OPTIONAL. Size of the label. {xs,sm, md, lg, xl}.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: used to determine if component is disabled or not

props.name: expanded
props.docs: used to set component's expanded mode

props.name: inputstyle
props.docs: used to provide an input style like 'danger'. Mostly used for testing purposes

props.name: max
props.docs: used to set a maximum allowed value

props.name: min
props.docs: used to set a minimum allowed value

props.name: preventValueMutation
props.docs: If set, component value won't be updated by itself.

props.name: size
props.docs: used to determine component's size

props.name: state
props.docs: used to provide an input state like 'hover' or 'focus'. Mostly used for testing purposes

props.name: step
props.docs: used to set a step to indicate the expected granularity

props.name: value
props.docs: used to hold the value of the number input

props.name: ariaLabel
props.docs: To define aria label of pagination

props.name: compact
props.docs: To define compact style of pagination

props.name: currentPage
props.docs: To define current page of pagination

props.name: firstLast
props.docs: To add First page / Last page icon buttons

props.name: inverse
props.docs: To render inverse styled pagination

props.name: pageJumper
props.docs: To add jump to page text input

props.name: pageSize
props.docs: To allow use select number of items to show per page

props.name: pages
props.docs: To define number of pages to render

props.name: results
props.docs: To show number of result items

props.name: size
props.docs: To define size of pagination elements

events.docs: Triggered when the user navigates to another page by clicking pagination item buttons or changing value of Page Jumper input
Triggered when the user changes items per page value

props.name: active
props.docs: to open or close the popover

props.name: arrow
props.docs: to add an arrow between the popover and the reference element

props.name: position
props.docs: to set position of the popover { top, top-start, top-end, right, right-start, right-end, bottom, bottom-start, bottom-end, left, left-start, left-end }

props.name: preventAutoHide
props.docs: Prevents closing the popover when clicking out of its bounds

props.name: reference
props.docs: CSS Selector to the reference Element. I.e. #id > p

props.name: title
props.docs: to define popover title.

props.name: variant
props.docs: To define popover variant { text, custom }

events.docs: Popover has been hidden to the user. The animation has completed.
Popover hide method has executed, but the closing animation has not started yet
Popover show method has executed, but the showing animation has not started yet
Popover has been shown to the user and is fully visible. The animation has completed.

props.name: max

props.name: state
props.docs: to indicate a progress bar state { info, warning, danger, success }.

props.name: value

props.name: backdrop

props.docs: to set color of a spinner { primary, dark, success, warning, danger, muted }.

props.name: size
props.docs: to set size of a spinner { xs, sm, sm--2, sm--3, md, lg, xl, xxl }.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: used to disable the toggle switch.

props.docs: to set a label for the toggle switch.
